events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on 2024-04-30 at an intersection. They filed a claim for the damages sustained to their car.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after confirming all details mentioned involve a car collision incident.
An insurance agent with expertise in auto accident claims was assigned to handle the customer's case swiftly.
The customer received acknowledgment that their auto accident claim was registered and is being reviewed promptly.
Customer was requested to submit accident photos, police report, and vehicle repair estimates for claim processing.
The customer promptly submitted all requested documents including photos of the damage and official police report.
The claims team began an investigation into the car accident details and damage assessment reports for accuracy.
Investigation completed confirming the accident circumstances matched the claim and damage reports submitted.
An initial settlement amount was proposed based on damage valuation and policy coverage terms for the accident.
Customer expressed concerns that the proposed settlement amount was lower than anticipated for the car repairs.
Due to customer dissatisfaction, the claim was escalated to a senior claims adjuster for re-evaluation.
After review, a fairer settlement figure was approved considering all factors of the vehicle damage and coverage.
The approved settlement payment was processed and issued to the customerâ€™s bank account quickly.
Following payment, the auto accident claim was officially closed with all parties satisfied with the resolution.
